extension.description: Welcome to DaButchers DaOnlyWizard, the only place to get DaButchers Builds Thanks whufclee at NaN, GUYS at TI, Brackets for the app installer!! RomanVM for the PyXBMCt libs. Fire TV Guru for the PyXBMCt layout Also a very special Thanks to Surfacingx for the code used in this add-on.
